CustomField.description: Created this field to track step up Discount to be Removed in Year 3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Step-ups include rate increases at periodic intervals. Complete this section by indicating the scheduled rate increases over the contract term (per year). For example, if the contract Term is 3 years, specify the amount of the step-up discount to be removed in Year 3 and so on.
CustomField.label: Step-up: Discount Removed in Year 3
